# Portfolio Website Development Guidelines

This is a React TypeScript portfolio website built with Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and React Router.

## Project Structure
- `/src/components/` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/pages/` - Route-based page components
- `/src/contexts/` - React context providers
- `/src/data/` - Static data and type definitions

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom classes
- **Animations**: Framer Motion for smooth animations
- **Routing**: React Router DOM for navigation
- **Icons**: Lucide React for consistent iconography
- **Theme**: Dark/Light mode support with context

## Coding Standards
- Use TypeScript for all components and utilities
- Follow functional component patterns with hooks
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Use Framer Motion for page transitions and animations
- Maintain consistent spacing with Tailwind utilities
- Follow semantic HTML structure for accessibility

## Component Guidelines
- All components should be responsive and accessible
- Use motion components for animations
- Implement proper TypeScript typing
- Follow the established color scheme and design patterns
- Ensure dark mode compatibility for all UI elements

## Data Management
- Portfolio data is centralized in `/src/data/portfolio.ts`
- Use TypeScript interfaces for type safety
- Keep personal information easily updatable
